column3: @mess110 Typically try to contact the user on IRC(or just ask on freenode #bitcoin-core-dev), people will help you find out.

> I really hope, I am not overstepping by submitting this PR, I tried to contact @kallewoof, but the user is not on slack. Since the PR was opened in May, I decided to try to help to improve it.\n\nNo problem! you're always free to continue an issue if it has been abandoned for a while and you want to help it forward. Thanks! If @kallewoof wants he can cherry-pick this into  #10367, if not we ca
I've definitely not abandoned it, and not sure why you would get that impression. I'll review your commits and cherry pick if they look good later today.
Work continuing on the prev PR, closing this one
